name: Microsoft Team Rooms Wallpaper package wrapper
description: A Microsoft Intune wrapper that enables deploying a custom wallpaper to Microsoft Teams Rooms devices via a PowerShell installer. It packages a wallpaper into an .INTUNEWIN package, supports install and uninstall commands, and uses registry-based detection to verify the deployed version. It also generates logs under the Intune Management Extension folder for troubleshooting, with a configurable company name for branding.
author: Niklas Rast
